      • removeKeywordsFromQuery

        public static java.lang.String removeKeywordsFromQuery(java.lang.String query)
        Removes the keywords from query. keywords: "select", "from", "where", "limit", "offset", "ask", "construct", "describe", "prefix", "optional", "filter", "distinct", "union", "_query="
        Parameters:
        query - the query
        Returns:
        the query with removed keywords

      • ignoreCaseIndexOf

        public static int ignoreCaseIndexOf(java.lang.String mainString,
                    java.lang.String str,
                    int fromIndex)
        Like indexOf but ignores case
        Parameters:
        mainString - the main string
        str - the string to find the index
        fromIndex - the index from where should be searched
        Returns:
        the index (if not found -1)

      • levenshteinDistance

        Returns:

      • levenshtein

        public static double levenshtein(java.lang.String str1,
                 java.lang.String str2,
                 int threshold)
        Calculates Levenshtein of two strings. If a given threshold can't be maintained the result will be 0.0
        Parameters:
        str1 - String to compare with the other string
        str2 - String to compare with the other string
        threshold - maximal allowed steps
        Returns:
        levenshtein if threshold could be maintained otherwise 0.0
